blocks.content: To some people the layout of this website might be familiar and that's because this project is my attempt to remake Miiverse (I really miss it to be honest) in a style that screams Chocobo~
I've got a long way to go and many things to add but I'm very happy of how things are turning out!
It will be interesting to see how this website evolves in the future so I'll be keeping this screenshot as a mark of how it used to look at the beginning.

I'm still thinking about the colors I should be using, text sizes and many other details which of course I will keep updating until I am 100% happy of the design but so far it's looking quite decent~ (maybe a little bit chaotic in some places...)
What is the purpose of this project?

There might be many other projects out there which are trying to revive Miiverse however this project of mine is not to create a platform but rather a website which is themed around Miiverse (of course with some changes that I like).

Everyone is free to use this template (I would call it) and customise it to their needs and liking. My motivation for this project was to create a cute area where I could share the screenshots I take in games and rant about them like I used to do back when I would post them on Miiverse.

At the moment of writing I've got some ideas of what I want to improve and what I want to change but I'm mostly working on removing some CSS from the template I used that I don't need for this project.

Also for the future I want to change the screenshots section to load screenshots dynamically from a JSON file like the posts section does so the index.html file is not cluttered with a huge number of screenshot files...
